name: Block vs Blocks
description:
Bang those squares with your block power, but don't take too long otherwise the laser is going to zap you!

Block vs Blocks is a fun and fast paced game to test your skills. Are you fast enough to swipe around the screen, avoiding obstacles, collecting power ups and aiming at the blocks with the smaller number to move faster?

Play NOW!
publishers: Clap Clap Desenvolvimento de Jogos Ltda ME
